productDescription: Use the snuffer to safely put your candle out and improve the longevity of your candle by keeping the wick in place.
sellerReview:
Amazing customer service and shipped super fast! All of them smell so good - Cozy and Cookies are
my fav scents ❤️

productDescription: ANY MESSAGE WILL BE IN CAPS.
sellerReview: The candle I got came out great! The packaging was secure and the candle looked so cute

productName: Handmade Soy Bubble Candle | Soy Vegan | Home Decor | GoldenSundays
productDescription: All Natural, Plant-Based Bubble Soy Wax Candles for Holiday gifts, Birthdays, Valentines, Housewarmings, Wedding/Event Favours, or just a treat for yourself.
sellerReview: I absolutely love the bubble candles! They look so cute and are so well made. Mabel was always so sweet and quick to respond to any questions I had throughout the process. Would definitely order from you again! Xx

productName: 16oz Handmade Soy Wax Candle in a Mason Jar with gold lid. Phthalate free/small batches/Made in Canada/non-gmo/eco-friendly/clean burning
sellerReview: Omg I’m in love! I ordered six to give as easy gifts, but I want to keep them all! I always loved scented candles but I  didn’t like the sickly sweet scent, and I noticed it bothered my dog too (she would sneeze a lot). These are amazing! You get enough scent to lightly fill a room, but it’s not overpowering to sit next to it either. The shipment was packaged very well and the jar are simply but cutely decorated. Also, the descriptions of the scents are weirdly accurate haha. I’m going to be a repeat customer for sure!

productName: Large Woman Body/ Woman Candle Body Candle / Nude Venus Goddess Figure Candle / Female Figure Bust / Venus Female Body Candle
productDescription: These are made to order - so please leave a note when purchasing on the colour and what finish you would like.

sellerReview: These candles are absolutely gorgeous, hands down my favorite candles. I can feel the energy of love that went into these and they smell and look amazing, I will definitely be purchasing more.

productName: MIX & MATCH any 4 Soy Candles Winter Wooden Wicks Gift Set Eco Friendly Hand Poured Free Shipping Woodwick Birthday Non Toxic Tin Can
sellerReview: These smell AMAZING and the packaging/containers are very pretty. I got the Lemon, Cucumber, Green Tea & White Pear, and Eucalyptus Spearmint scents and they are everything I hoped for. They are not cloying, I immediately lit them in different rooms and the way they fill the air is refreshing and lovely. I'm wandering room to room just happily enjoying. I'm delighted with my purchase, production and delivery was fast, and highly recommend these candles!!!

productName: Bubble Cube Candle | Bubble Candle | Rubiks Candle | Cloud Candle | Gift for Her | Gift for Mom | Homemade Decor | Self Gift
productDescription: Each candle is hand poured and may have minor imperfections. They’re made with 100% pure soy wax so “frosting” (a totally natural result from using soy wax) may occur. Any imperfections do not affect the actual burn of the candle.
sellerReview: very well packaged and shipped fast! the candle is so minimalist and smells amazing (i didn’t even light it yet but my room already smelled like it) the air freshener and the aster seeds that the seller included along with the candle really made my day! will definitely purchase more in the future!! :))

productName: Sandalwood and Blue Sage | Classic blends series| 8oz Pure Soy Luxury Candle |Home Decor | Gift | Non-Toxic| Vegan| valentine gift
productDescription: A clean, soft fragrance with notes of warm sandalwood, bright bergamot, soft lavender and sage.
sellerReview: I really enjoy this candle; I have it lit almost every day. Love the idea of supporting a local candle business over buying from the big companies that have enough business. The packaging was great; nothing broke. The candle itself is very presentable. Many people had no clue it came from a local business! I would love to see the candles bigger - perhaps with 3 wicks? It'd be nice to get the entire room full of the aroma instead of just a section of the room. Overall, would recommend. If you like sandalwood and sage, you've come to the right place.

productName: Cactus Candle | Succulent Candle | Terrarium Candle | Plant Gift | Valentines Day Gift | Gift for Her | Homemade Decor | Self Gift
productDescription: This succulent candle has a unisex scent. It smells like cactus and seasalt; shimmering green cactus mingled with clean ocean air, sea spray, driftwood and sea moss.  You will love this sea side blend of fresh ozone notes on a base of sweet musk.
sellerReview: Absolutely amazing. She surpassed my expectations! The candle is not only adorable, she included a hand written note and a few other goodies for free! 100% recommend!

productName: Tobacco Vanilla | 8oz Pure Soy Luxury Candle |Home Decor | Birthday Candle Gift | Non-Toxic| Vegan | Gift for her | valentine gift
sellerReview: I really enjoy this candle; I have it lit almost every day. Love the idea of supporting a local candle business over buying from the big companies that have enough business. The packaging was great; nothing broke. The candle itself is very presentable. Many people had no clue it came from a local business! I would love to see the candles bigger - perhaps with 3 wicks? It'd be nice to get the entire room full of the aroma instead of just a section of the room. Overall, would recommend. If you like sandalwood and sage, you've come to the right place.

productName: Candle Holder in Pure Black Stoneware/Faux Cast Iron Candle Holder (MADE TO ORDER)
productDescription: Each classic candle holder is thrown on the potters wheel using a magnesium rich stoneware that once fired turns a stunning true black. Each candle stick holder has a deep wide bowl around the actual holder to catch any drips that may occur. There is also a very comfortable single finger handle for easy transporting once your candle is lit.
sellerReview: My bowl is my most favorite quarantine purchase. It is the perfect shape and size and color and I could not be happier. Thank you Ash for making such gorgeous things!

productDescription: Made with pure soy wax, and essential oils, fragrance oils, natural colour.
sellerReview: This was such a luxe treat. Feel so cozy while I burn this candle. Love the scent and can’t wait to try the others.

productName: Intention Candle 8 oz Container - Citrus Mist
sellerReview: I love this print, the fit is nice and I get lots of compliments when I wear it

sellerReview: I chose coastal air and it smells great. The label is perfect and the jar is so cute!!
So cute! Smells amazing and love the crystal accents on top.
I’m so picky when it comes to candles! Finally!! A candle you can enjoy many times. No guilt about letting this one brighting up your space all day. 💜 AND they do custom orders 🍒!
